name: HearingLossDisorders
title: Hearing Loss Disorders
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to hearing loss.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes generalized hearing loss terms in relation to sensorineural, conduction, idiopathic, and combination terms (eg. conductive/sensorineural).),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes hearing loss terms in relation to ototoxicity, presbycusis, and non-speaking deafness.)
